articles.title: Franco Salinas
articles.contents:
About me:
I am a big data enthusiast! I have three years of experience conducting marketing mixed modeling for retail and restaurant businesses. I enjoy conducting evidence-based research, building dashboards, data pipelines, and providing actionable insights. I have worked in corporate, non-profit, and academic settings. I am proficient in working with time series, and longitudinal and spatial data. I have worked with SQL, R, Python, VBA, STATA, Java, and Microsoft Office.
Education:
I am a candidate of Masters of Science in Business Analytics at UTAustin. I am also a BA in Economics and Statistics from Macalester College. I graduated Magna Cum Laude and I was nominated to be part of the Phi Beta Kappa academic honor society.
Interests:
I am interested in data science, and business development.
Contact Information:
Email: francosalme1998@gmail.com
Phone: +1 (612) 446-9161
